Article DOI: https://doi.org/10.30574/wjbphs.2024.18.3.0330  
Abstract 
Drugs play an important role in improving health and promoting well-being. However to produce desired effect, they 
have to be safe, efficacious and have to be used rationally. Every pregnant women is advised to take supplements which 
include vitamins and minerals for the healthy development of the fetus and mother. In case, of any co-morbidity
